sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for determination of particle size using a particle size analyzer.
sections.scope: Applicable to particle size analysis carried out in the Central Instrumentation Facility.
procedure: Switch ON the particle size analyzer.
Allow the instrument to initialize and stabilize.
Prepare the sample dispersion as per guidelines.
Load the sample into the measurement cell.
Set analysis parameters using the software.
Start the measurement and record particle size distribution.
After analysis, clean the sample cell and switch OFF the instrument.
sections.precautions: Ensure proper dispersion of sample. Avoid air bubbles during measurement.
